name: specswarm
description: Complete software development toolkit: spec-driven workflows, autonomous orchestration, lifecycle management (bugfix/modify/refactor), quality validation, and performance monitoring. v3.3.6: Action-focused skill triggers - fixed fix/ship/upgrade detection. v3.3.5: EXTREMELY broad triggers. v3.3.4: Loose triggers + confirm. v3.3.3: Intent disambiguation. v3.3.2: Simplified Skills. v3.3.1: Natural language via Skills. v3.3.0: Natural language commands. v3.2.0: Multi-language support.
